name: Moon Runner (itch) (Dreamaise)
description:
This is very early beta . I put the game up to get opinions on length of level and difficulty.

All systems are in place and working .

Controls-  

Left Arrow - Move Left

 Right Arrow - Move Right

Up Arrow - Increase Speed

Down Arrow - Decrease Speed

 Space Bar - Jump

Esc - Pause

Early Beta test 1 -

How difficult is the world?

 Is it long enough?

(Full screen button is there in the bottom right for best experience)

Any Feedback would be great! Comment away!

Earth-Mars and Venus Now Open!
